item.description:
I am a Somphomore Undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur majoring in Computer Science and Engineering, broadly interested in the areas of Probabilistic Machine Learning and Deep Learning.

My sophomore year research work has been centered around using Tensors for Approximate Inference on multi way and temporal data. Under the supervision of Prof. Ketan Rajawat, I am working on developing a Tensor based model using Time Series for solving the problem of Traffic Estimation and Prediction.

I’ve had some exposure to Recommender Systems ,Autoencoders ,Generative Adversarial Networks(GANs) and Deep Learning in the past.
